oai_dc:dc.dc:title: TRANSIENT ANOMALOUS SUB-DIFFUSION ON BOUNDED DOMAINS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MEERSCHAERT, MM
NANE, E
VELLAISAMY, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fractional diffusion
Cauchy problem
tempered stable
boundary value problem
TIME RANDOM-WALKS
MODELS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper develops strong solutions and stochastic solutions for the tempered fractional diffusion equation on bounded domains. First the eigenvalue problem for tempered fractional derivatives is solved. Then a separation of variables and eigenfunction expansions in time and space are used to write strong solutions. Finally, stochastic solutions are written in terms of an inverse subordinator.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: PROCEEDINGS OF THE AMERICAN MATHEMATICAL SOCIETY, 141(2)699-710
